post.text:
Donald Trump has spent years peddling lies about President Obama.

And that didn't stop today.

comment.author: Jessica
comment.text: I recall Hillary brought up the whole birther issue didn't she? Now that Obama is protecting her and she has the dirt on his corruption they are covering for each other. We need Trump in office to clean up the filth generated by these two anti-Americans.

replies.author: Brandon
replies.text: You are dimwitted get your facts straight stop repeating trump's lies!

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: You are such a pleasant person Brandon - thank you for your kind words. It is expected from someone who supports a liar and a crook. Have a nice day and looking forward to everyone catching on that Hillary is a empty soul and Trump will be our next President.

replies.author: Bridger
replies.text: Toxic Tramp trolls - your bullshyt only works in your basket
